TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to add possible.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on possible cause tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on possible cause tab .
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on possible cause tab .

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Click on Add Possible Cause Button.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on add possible cause button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on add possible cause button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on add possible cause button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter possible cause.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter possible cause.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter possible cause.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter possible description.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter possible description.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter possible description.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on save button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify toast message.
